price: 16. (Los mensajeros) dijeron: “Nuestro Señor sabe bien que hemos sido enviados a ustedes como mensajeros.
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbunā yaʿlamu innā ilaykum lamur'salūna
